category.name: Sony
category.description: The Sony Corporation was founded in the year 1946 in the city of Tokyo. From starting out as a simple electronics store, the Company has grown tremendously since, to become one of the world leaders in not just basic electronics, but also Gaming, Entertainment, Media and Financial Services. The Company has been manufacturing electronics for professionals as well as the average consumer. Sony Corporation comes under the larger Sony Group, which is the parent company for various other subsidiaries. The company is well known for their high quality phones and cameras and also for their home theatre and other entertainment devices. They have also been releasing high quality mobile phones under the banner of Sony Ericsson. Now however, they have rebranded themselves, and release phones under the Sony brand alone. Apart from some memorable phones like the Walkman Series or the Xperia Series of phones, they have released some very good cameras as well. The Sony Alpha cameras are part of the SLR range of cameras. These are quite different from the Cybershot cameras as the Cybershots come under digital cameras with full auto-settings. The SLR Alpha cameras however are professional grade cameras with manual settings. These cameras can be manually tweaked to give you high quality images as long as you have the skills to operate an SLR camera to its full potential. You can easily buy Sony Cameras online through Flipkart's shopping website. This is easily achieved by logging onto the website and going through all the Cameras on offer. You can pick out a few of them and choose the right one based on the specifications of each device. There is also an option t choose and compare a few products. This will be helpful in situations where you need to check the finer details and differences between each device. Once you have been able to come to a decision about the kind of camera you wish to buy from Flipkart, you can proceed to the order placement page and get the order confirmed. After this comes the payment option which can be done through Credit Card, Debit Card or even by Net Banking. Apart from these payment options you can also go in for Cash or Card on delivery. This way, you can make the payment once you receive the shipment. If you have a change of mind, you can also go in for a replacement product or even a refund.

category.name: Knife Gate Valves
category.description: Knife gate valve is one of the most preferred industrial valves. It is featured with minimum contact between moving parts of the valves. In this type of valve, a gate is practically held between layers of gland packing without touching the body parts during most of its travels.

description: Regent knife gate valves M-series is greatly appreciated for its cost effectiveness. This series is developed with an aim to enhance customer's profitability and satisfaction.
name: M-Series

preset.value: Knife gate valve is one of the most preferred industrial valves. It is featured with minimum contact between moving parts of the valves. In this type of valve, a gate is practically held between layers of gland packing without touching the body parts during most of its travels.

The seating is accomplished with a non-sliding motion aided by jams located in the body. Avoiding sliding contact between gate and body permits this valve to handle abrasive particles present in the media much better than conventional designs.

In abrasive media, deflection cones are used to avoid direct impingement of the media on the seat surface. Besides this, sometimes hard facing of seat part is also used, which involves stelliting of the seat or gate or complete intruding of body as well as gate.
This valve is named 'Knife' because of the beveled bottom edge of the gate. It allows positive closure of the gate even when solid particles settles at the bottom of the body.

Another feature is the purge connection which allows the flow of suitable fluids at pressures higher than line pressure in order to clean seating surfaces (body purges) and packing area (chest purges). This helps in minimizing abrasive wear and tear during opening and closure of valve.
Sewage and Waste Water Treatment, Chemical Sludges, Sticky Media Molasses
Hopper isolation valves, Pneumatic conveying systems, polymer chips handling, Weighing & batching systems, Dryers; Coal burner valves to NFPA-8503 specifications
Knife Gate Valves are used in a variety of applications such as:

category.name: Knife Gate Valves
category.description: Knife gate valve is one of the most preferred industrial valves. It is featured with minimum contact between moving parts of the valves. In this type of valve, a gate is practically held between layers of gland packing without touching the body parts during most of its travels.

description: Regent meets the challenges of paper, chemical, textile, sewage plants, power plats and sugar mills by refining the K-Series Knife Gate Valve. A precision-buffed knife plate cuts even the heaviest sludges sharply and without erosion. One-piece trim p
name: K-Series

preset.value: Tough and corrosion resistant trims- The stainless steel inner body is welded to the cast iron gland. The gland's poly-vinyl chloride coating provides maximum resistance to corrosion and wear.

A choice of three different seat rings-In addition to the standard stainless steel seat ring; rubber and Teflon seat rings are also available as options. Choose the one best that best suits your fluid control requirements.
Smooth hand wheel opening / closing- The double-thread screw on the stem facilitates smooth and speedy opening / closing.
Bosses for positive seating-Two bosses are welded to the value seat. These press knife plates are placed snugly against the side of the seat ring for bubble-tight shut-off.
The stainless steel knife plate is precious-buffed for tight shut-off. Its knife-like edge cuts off and shuts off even heavy or high-viscous fluids.
Plane value seat to resist build-up- The plane surface of the value seat has no recesses to harbor heavy fluid deposits that could build up and swamp the value.
Leak tight multilayer gland packing- The gland packing is Teflon-impregnated asbestos or vegetable yarn layered with moulded silicon rubber. This chemical-resistant packing provides total sealing.

category.name: Knife Gate Valves
category.description: Knife gate valve is one of the most preferred industrial valves. It is featured with minimum contact between moving parts of the valves. In this type of valve, a gate is practically held between layers of gland packing without touching the body parts during most of its travels.

description: We manufacture a series of special design S-Series Knife Gate Valves using premium quality raw material. Our team of highly-qualified professional handles the manufacturing processes most efficiently. The S-Series knife gate valves offered by us are
name: S-Series

preset.value: Stainless steel (304/316/316l/317) as standard, other grades available as specials.
Complete in investment casting Stainless steel (cf8/cf8m), ss317/316l/317l/310 and cast steel, other also available as specials.
Face-to-Face dimensions and valve port id conform to mss sp-81.

category.name: Butterfly Valves
category.description: We offer best quality Manual Operated Regent Butterfly Valves that have centric disc construction. This single piece body resilient seated seat is made using various materials of construction. These seats yield 100% tight shut-off in both directions of flow against vacuum and design pressure ratings of PN 1.0 and PN 1.6.

description: We offer best quality Manual Operated Regent Butterfly Valves that have centric disc construction. This single piece body resilient seated seat is made using various materials of construction. These seats yield 100% tight shut-off in both directions
name: Manual Operated

properties.name: Salient features of Resilient Seated values.

preset.value: One piece shaft delivers positive disk to seat location with maximum strength.
Top flange is designed and developed as per ISO 5211. It is perfect for direct mounting of gear operators and actuators.
All valves are specially designed for installation between ANSI Class 125/150 flanges, DIN 2501 PN10/PN16 and BS10 Table D and E.
Heavy Duty, square grooved design seat with unique "Center Lock" feature. It prevents seat movement during the seating and unseating of the disc.
Double "O" rings molded at the seat/disc/stem junction facilitate reliable primary and secondary sealing at the stem. Body/Flange sealing is achieved by built-in O ring and serves as a flange gasket.
All seats Peroxide Cured as standard to yield long lasting seat life and best elastic properties.

Disc stem engagement is achieved by a precision machined "Double D" engagement. The method provides all the advantages of one-piece stem/disc connection. Also eliminates any disadvantages associated with other methods of stem/disc engagement such as disc retaining screws, taper pins etc.

Superior Stem Retention System: The stem is securely retained in the body with a stainless steel washer and a heavy-duty circlip thus providing "Blow Out Proof" stem assembly. The design is provided for quick seat replacement and easy on-site disassembly.

category.name: Butterfly Valves
category.description: We offer best quality Manual Operated Regent Butterfly Valves that have centric disc construction. This single piece body resilient seated seat is made using various materials of construction. These seats yield 100% tight shut-off in both directions of flow against vacuum and design pressure ratings of PN 1.0 and PN 1.6.

description: REGENT offers ISO Standard Gear Operated Butterfly Valves which are engineered for multiple ON/OFF operations in the large pipe lines and full flow down streams.
name: Gear Operated

preset.key: Mounting Std. ISO 1900:2000, An International Standard

preset.value: CI (IS 210 Gr. FG 200/220)/ Cast Steel(W C B)
Centric Disc Butterfly value with a single piece rubber lined body
Heavy Duty, square grooved design seat with unique "Center Lock" feature. It prevents seat movement during the seating and unseating of the disc.

Disc stem engagement is achieved by a precision machined "Double D" engagement. The method provides all the advantages of one-piece stem/disc connection. Also eliminates any disadvantages associated with other methods of stem/disc engagement such as disc retaining screws, taper pins etc.
Top flange is designed and developed as per ISO 5211. It is perfect for direct mounting of gear operators and actuators.
All valves are specially designed for installation between ANSI Class 125/150 flanges, DIN 2501 PN10/PN16 and BS10 Table D and E.

Superior Stem Retention System: The stem is securely retained in the body with a stainless steel washer and a heavy-duty circlip thus providing "Blow Out Proof" stem assembly. The design is provided for quick seat replacement and easy on-site disassembly.
All seats Peroxide Cured as standard to yield long lasting seat life and best elastic properties.
Double "O" rings molded at the seat/disc/stem junction facilitate reliable primary and secondary sealing at the stem. Body/Flange sealing is achieved by built-in O ring and serves as a flange gasket.

category.name: Globe Valve
category.description:
Globe Valve is a type of valve consisting of a movable disk-type element and a stationary ring seat in a spherical body. This valve is generally used for regulating flow in a pipeline. Due to its salient features, globe valve is used for applications requiring throttling and frequent operation. 

We manufacture best quality globe valves in compliance with the international standards of quality. Following are the technical specifications for the globe valves offered by us.

category.name: Canon
category.description: Canon is a Japanese imaging and optics manufacturing company. They specialize in Cameras, Steppers Printers and of course, high quality precision oriented Camcorders. They have their headquarters located in Tokyo, Japan. This electronics giant is well known around the world for their Canon IXUS range of digital cameras. These early point and shoot cameras were very simple to use and greatly promoted casual photography. Their current crowd favorite is the PowerShot series of point and shoot cameras. The advantages of having a simple digital camera over an SLR camera is that they are faster to shoot with, easier to carry around and less intimidating than a professional grade camera. These cameras also can be powered with rechargeable batteries and battery packs. Choosing the right Canon camera is quite easy as long as you know what kind of photography you want to try out. For casual photographers, the simple point and shoot is more than enough. For professional photographers, an SLR or at least the advanced point and shoot camera is a must. SLR cameras have a lot of features packed into it, otherwise unavailable on a simple digi-cam. Mirrorless Cameras are also advanced cameras with better image sensors and a lack of a reflecting medium. You can choose the right kind of Canon Camera to buy on Flipkart's online shopping web portal by simply logging onto the site and browsing though the extensive collection. You can go through the products with the help of search filters provided to easily narrow down your search. Once this has been done, you can commence your final stages of choice by comparing a few cameras and going through the specifications and product descriptions. This is a vital step as it will help you decide on the final product. Once you have finally picked out your favorite Canon Camera, you can proceed to the order page to place a home delivery order. This takes place once the order has been confirmed. Confirmation of an order takes place after you have provided all the necessary details for a successful home delivery. You will need t provide a destination address as well as a contact number. Once the process has been completed and the order has been confirmed, it will not take more than a few days for you to get your Canon Camera delivered to your doorstep. You can opt for Credit Card, Debit Card or Net Banking payment options as well as Cash on Delivery.

description: DSLR cameras are always preferred over others as they are much more capable in terms of pure photography and can also be more flexible in the quality of photos taken. The Canon EOS 600D is an advanced entry level DSLR that is extremely user friendly.

category.name: Nicon
category.description: Nikon is a Japanese Optics and Imaging Company based in Tokyo Japan. Their foremost field of expertise is in lens technology, cameras and other optical instruments like microscopes, binoculars and optical measurement instruments. Nikon Cameras are a staple when it comes to photography. Their workmanship and quality of build make them the obvious choice for photographers everywhere. Beginners and professionals use Nikon Cameras due to the high image quality and other extra features found commonly in a Nikon. For the Casual photographer, the Coolpix series of cameras have been developed with a lot of features installed to ensure quality pictures across a variety of environments. These cameras are auto focus devices that take care of all the basic processes of photography. Also known as Point and Shoot (Point & Shoot) cameras, they have a lot of manual controls disabled to ensure all photos are digitally well composed thanks to the inbuilt sensors. You can also go in for the SLR cameras or the Advanced Point and Shoot cameras if you are new yet willing to learn the finer aspects of photography. All these types of Nikon Cameras can be bought on Flipkart's online shopping website by simply logging onto it and browsing through the extensive catalog of products. There is also the option for you to compare a few cameras together in order to come to a conclusion on which one to settle for. Once you have made your choice on which Nikon you want, you can go through its specifications to know everything there is to know about it. If that is not enough, you even have a brief description on the product to help you make your mind. Once this information has been absorbed, you can make an informed decision about your favorite Nikon Camera. After selecting the product, you need to place the order for it to be delivered to your home, or any other destination that you choose. For this, enter your address, phone number and contact email address. All this helps in the delivery process. After this has been done, and the order gets confirmed, you will receive the delivery within just a matter of a few days. There are various options of payment available to you. Credit Card, Debit Card and Net Banking are some of the more popular methods; though Cash on Delivery is equally popular in areas where online transfers are not possible.

description:
Taking a picture or shooting a video is not just about saving a series of memories, you also put in a lot of your own creativity to bring the moment alive in an artificial medium which by itself is no easy task. The D5200 by Nikon is a great DSLR camera with exceptional handling and exciting new perspectives depending on the kind of lens you pair it with.
This camera is equipped with a fairly large, powerful 24.1 MP DX-format CMOS sensor that can take stunning pictures across a wide range of lighting conditions. The sensor is designed to reproduce images with stunning quality and it can also be used for high sensitivity images that require a range of ISO settings. The EXPEED 3 image processing engine works well with the intelligent scene recognition system that can automatically set the right values for a perfect shot.
name: Nikon D5200 SLR

category.name: Panasonic
category.description: The Sony Corporation was founded in the year 1946 in the city of Tokyo. From starting out as a simple electronics store, the Company has grown tremendously since, to become one of the world leaders in not just basic electronics, but also Gaming, Entertainment, Media and Financial Services. The Company has been manufacturing electronics for professionals as well as the average consumer. Sony Corporation comes under the larger Sony Group, which is the parent company for various other subsidiaries. The company is well known for their high quality phones and cameras and also for their home theatre and other entertainment devices. They have also been releasing high quality mobile phones under the banner of Sony Ericsson. Now however, they have rebranded themselves, and release phones under the Sony brand alone. Apart from some memorable phones like the Walkman Series or the Xperia Series of phones, they have released some very good cameras as well. The Sony Alpha cameras are part of the SLR range of cameras. These are quite different from the Cybershot cameras as the Cybershots come under digital cameras with full auto-settings. The SLR Alpha cameras however are professional grade cameras with manual settings. These cameras can be manually tweaked to give you high quality images as long as you have the skills to operate an SLR camera to its full potential. You can easily buy Sony Cameras online through Flipkart's shopping website. This is easily achieved by logging onto the website and going through all the Cameras on offer. You can pick out a few of them and choose the right one based on the specifications of each device. There is also an option t choose and compare a few products. This will be helpful in situations where you need to check the finer details and differences between each device. Once you have been able to come to a decision about the kind of camera you wish to buy from Flipkart, you can proceed to the order placement page and get the order confirmed. After this comes the payment option which can be done through Credit Card, Debit Card or even by Net Banking. Apart from these payment options you can also go in for Cash or Card on delivery. This way, you can make the payment once you receive the shipment. If you have a change of mind, you can also go in for a replacement product or even a refund.

description: The Panasonic HDC Point & Shoot camera is a highly capable device and is also great for beginners and intermediates alike.The camera comes with a powerful 20.4 MP EXMOR R Sensor. This Panasonic HDC sensor is a great choice for high speed photography and even for low light conditions. The BIONZ image processor allows for high quality images.This camera is equipped with Carl Zeiss optics and is also supplemented with the Vario Sonnar T Lens. This arrangement is highly useful for high quality photos along a wide range of lighting conditions. The lens is capable of a zoom level that is 50 times more than the standard focus. The 100 X clear image zoom feature also augments this 50 X zoom lens.This is a feature found commonly in many cameras though most do not offer high speed auto modes. This camera however is able to support high speed auto modes that can help in times when you need to quickly takes some photographs and you are left with little or no time to manually set the values.
name: Panasonic HDC-MDH 1 Professional Video

The company is well known for their high quality phones and cameras and also for their home theatre and other entertainment devices. They have also been releasing high quality mobile phones under the banner of Sony Ericsson. Now however, they have rebranded themselves, and release phones under the Sony brand alone. Apart from some memorable phones like the Walkman Series or the Xperia Series of phones, they have released some very good cameras as well. The Sony Alpha cameras are part of the SLR range of cameras. These are quite different from the Cybershot cameras as the Cybershots come under digital cameras with full auto-settings. The SLR Alpha cameras however are professional grade cameras with manual settings. These cameras can be manually tweaked to give you high quality images as long as you have the skills to operate an SLR camera to its full potential. You can easily buy Sony Cameras online through Flipkart's shopping website. This is easily achieved by logging onto the website and going through all the Cameras on offer. You can pick out a few of them and choose the right one based on the specifications of each device. There is also an option t choose and compare a few products. This will be helpful in situations where you need to check the finer details and differences between each device. Once you have been able to come to a decision about the kind of camera you wish to buy from Flipkart, you can proceed to the order placement page and get the order confirmed. After this comes the payment option which can be done through Credit Card, Debit Card or even by Net Banking. Apart from these payment options you can also go in for Cash or Card on delivery. This way, you can make the payment once you receive the shipment. If you have a change of mind, you can also go in for a replacement product or even a refund.

description: The Sony Cyber-shot DSC Point & Shoot camera is a highly capable device and is also great for beginners and intermediates alike.The camera comes with a powerful 20.4 MP EXMOR R Sensor. This CMOS sensor is a great choice for high speed photography and even for low light conditions. The BIONZ image processor allows for high quality images.This camera is equipped with Carl Zeiss optics and is also supplemented with the Vario Sonnar T Lens. This arrangement is highly useful for high quality photos along a wide range of lighting conditions. The lens is capable of a zoom level that is 50 times more than the standard focus. The 100 X clear image zoom feature also augments this 50 X zoom lens.This is a feature found commonly in many cameras though most do not offer high speed auto modes. This camera however is able to support high speed auto modes that can help in times when you need to quickly takes some photographs and you are left with little or no time to manually set the values.
